meanings.definition: A person given to excessive sexual indulgence.
meanings.sent1: The old man was known in the village as a lecher.
meanings.sent2: The lecher's reputation preceded him wherever he went.
meanings.sent3: The comedy show portrayed a lecher in a hilarious light.
meanings.sent4: His eyes roamed like a lecher in a crowded room.
meanings.sent5: The movie villain was depicted as a lecher to emphasize his wickedness.

meanings.sent1: He would lecher after every woman he met.
meanings.sent2: She felt uncomfortable when he started to lecher at her.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat seemed to lecher at the birds outside.
meanings.sent4: His mind would often lecher when he was bored at work.
meanings.sent5: The dark clouds seemed to lecher towards the horizon, foretelling a storm.
